valid.markedOther: {{nickname}} got a mark for completing a word.
valid.eliminatedOther: {{nickname}} was eliminated for completing a word.
valid.markedYou: You called a valid word. The previous player got a mark.
valid.eliminatedYou: You called a valid word. The previous player has been eliminated.

invalid.marked: You called an invalid word and got a mark.

callBluff.waiting: You called bluff on the previous player. Waiting for their response.

bluffFalse.markedYou: Your bluff call was incorrect and you got a mark.
bluffFalse.eliminatedYou: Your bluff call was incorrect. The word was valid.
bluffFalse.markedOther: {{nickname}}'s bluff call was incorrect and got a mark.
bluffFalse.eliminatedOther: {{nickname}} was eliminated for an incorrect bluff call.

bluffTrue.markedYou: You were unable to complete the word and got a mark.
bluffTrue.eliminatedYou: You were unable to complete the word after being challenged.
bluffTrue.markedOther: {{nickname}} couldn't complete the word and got a mark.

fold.marked: You folded and got a mark.
fold.eliminated: You folded and have been eliminated.

timeout.marked: You ran out of time and got a mark.
timeout.eliminated: You ran out of time and have been eliminated.
